email_id.description: The unique ID of the unsubscribed email.

email_address.description: The email address of the subscriber who unsubscribed.

vip.description: Indicates whether the subscriber was a VIP.

timestamp.description: The date and time when the subscriber unsubscribed.

reason.description: The reason provided by the subscriber for unsubscribing.

campaign_id.description: The ID of the campaign associated with the unsubscribe.

list_id.description: The ID of the list from which the subscriber unsubscribed.

list_is_active.description: Indicates whether the list is active or inactive.
